name: Alien Escape (itch) (KayOfWays)
description:
You're an Alien Ship that has been captured for research. Your goal is to escape the facility

There are Parts of alien technology littered in the facility that manipulate lasers so don't shoot blindly!!

This is my first game. Was attempting a jam but was way too late :P. 

Definitely will add more so check back for updates

Credits:

Music - Lewis Rose 

Auto Settings - Sam Bonifacio

Most 3D Assets -  PO.Art, Starlight Arts

Effects - W3 Studios, Kakky, Silver Tim

HUD - Krystian Komisarek
